interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AIKIMUSE Face Oil Primer(1 Count)，Makeup Primer,24k Rose Gold Elixir，Skin Beauty Oil Essential，For Use Under Makeup or as a Face Oil Skin Moisturizing Product
Review Date: 2018/11/28
Store: AIKIMUSE
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.7 x 4.7 x 3.2 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '756289563933'}
Review Text: Its great to make your skin looks hidrataded. I buy it cause my lips, but it works great in skin too. But if you use it before makeup, your skin going to look oily, so I recomend to use a opaque powder or just use it at night before sleep. If your skin is oily maybe is not good for you neither cause this product made my skin too oily after use it and my skin is dry.  Plus, I used it to repare my old mascara, I had to use a little more product that I expected, but it works.
Review Title: I recomend to use it if you have a dry skin only.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.7 x 4.7 x 3.2 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '756289563933'}
Its great to make your skin looks hidrataded. I buy it cause my lips, but it works great in skin too. But if you use it before makeup, your skin going to look oily, so I recomend to use a opaque powder or just use it at night before sleep. If your skin is oily maybe is not good for you neither cause this product made my skin too oily after use it and my skin is dry.  Plus, I used it to repare my old mascara, I had to use a little more product that I expected, but it works.
I recomend to use it if you have a dry skin only.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Body art remains a primary focus, specifically in temporary tattoos, henna, airbrush designs, face painting, and glitter applications. The user also shows an emerging interest in skincare and makeup products that enhance the overall aesthetic.
- **Preferences:** Continues to value ease of use and versatility, seeking products that can be reused or serve multiple functions. There is a growing preference for products that not only support body art applications but also contribute to overall skin health and beauty.
- **Satisfaction Level:** Maintains a positive attitude towards products, as evidenced by enthusiastic feedback and a consistent rating of satisfaction. Recently, the user expressed enjoyment of a skincare product aimed at improving skin hydration.
- **Behavior:** Engages with products that enhance creativity and self-expression through temporary body art, while also exploring skincare solutions. The user is likely to appreciate products that simplify application processes, are user-friendly, and improve the skin's appearance, aligning with their artistic pursuits and desire for effective beauty solutions.

Overall, this user demonstrates a clear inclination towards creative and artistic endeavors in body art, with an added interest in skincare products that support their beauty routine effectively.
